attributes.action: Conduct a Thorough Review of the Justice System in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From my experiences and from listening to the experiences of other people I would say that our justice systems fail to deliver justice most of the time.  The system needs an overhaul and we need mechanisms put in place to correct failures on an on-going basis.  The current mechanisms obviously don't work very well.
